questions.title: 我决定在决赛前天天练习投篮。
questions.answer: I am determined to practice shooting every day before the final.

questions.title: 局长决定把贪污事件彻查到底。
questions.answer: Director of the bureau is determined to get to the bottom of the graftmatter.

questions.title: 我决定在吃饭前喝点威士忌。
questions.answer: I am determined to drink some whisky before dinner.

questions.title: 我父母决定送我去日本留学。
questions.answer: My parents determined to send me to Japan to study.

questions.title: 经过深思熟虑，露西决定嫁给汤姆。
questions.answer: Lucy was determined to marry Tom after much meditation.

questions.title: 他下定决心，不管碰到什么困难，都要坚持做这工作。
questions.answer: He was determined to hold on to this job whatever difficulties he mightrun into.

title: ——我下定决心走自己的路，坚持自己的梦想。
——走自己的路，让别人去说吧。

answer.en: I'm determined to go my own way and stick to my own dream.
Go your own way regardless of what people say.
I'm determined to study hard and make progress every day.
You make such a resolution every day.

title: ——我的小儿子决定自己存钱旅游。
——哇，他是一个有志气的男孩。

answer.en: My youngest son is determined to save up for travel himself.
Wow, he is an ambitious boy.
